name: Parlor! Pro 4
overview: Parlor! Pro 4 is the fourth game of the series of the same name released for the Playstation console and is a gambling game that features 2 different gambling machines. The game features also a sort of a story mode in which the player is a pachinko gambler and got a week to go around the different pachinko places and try to win a lot of money in the machines.
